text:
I don’t know what happened, but WGLMakie stopped displaying plots for me in Pluto again.

MacOS, latest Pluto, JSServe, WGLMakie, 1.5 and 1.6-beta1

I am getting warnings like this:
```┌ Warning: Waiting for page sessions to load.
│                 This can happen for the first cells to run, or is indicative of faulty state
└ @ JSServe ~/.julia/packages/JSServe/bo3OG/src/display.jl:158
┌ Warning: Removing unopened Session: d4ae2843-9541-465b-af3a-aa8ef235fad2
└ @ JSServe ~/.julia/packages/JSServe/bo3OG/src/display.jl:146
┌ Warning: Waiting for page sessions to load.
│                 This can happen for the first cells to run, or is indicative of faulty state```
Now I regret that I always use `Pkg.activate(temp=true)` , and I can’t go back to old Manifest.toml.

I’ve removed .julia/packages and .julia/compiled, but that didn’t help. (I even restarted the browser :sweat_smile:)
